item.description:
We've got a lot of new members that have joined our group - time to get us all together to celebrate our love of fabulous beers! I want to encourage as many people as possible to meet us at The Publick House for drinks, mingling, and fun. We have a great base of people who come to every event and I am looking forward to seeing a bunch of new faces.

If you haven't been to The Publick House, you can check it out on yelp. It can be really hard to get a table there, so please make sure to RSVP and I will do what I can to get us some space together or set up a reservation.

I look forward to seeing you all there! Please let me know if you have any questions :)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send out a message with my cell phone later so you can find us!
item.why: It's time for us to get back to basics - let's get together and drink some beers! The Publick House is a great environment for us to sip on some great brews.
item.name: New (and Existing) Member Mixer @ Publick House
